sample_text:
This Add-on cover will be providing instant addition of 100% Basic Sum Insured on complete or partial 
utilization of Your Sum Insured rebound or Restore benefit (as applicable) during the Policy Year. This Add-
on will trigger unlimited times and is available for all subsequent claims in a Policy Year. 
Conditions: 
i. 
The Sum Insured will be restored under this Add-on for the subsequent claim in the Policy Year. 
ii.
